ISSUE.TITLE: [feature]: Can I help make a Russian translation?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Summary If you use some package for interface translation, translators from our company could send you a Russian translation. It would be much easier for our employees to use your product. ### Why should this be worked on? I think translation into many languages is helpful in general. We can also translate into Serbian.
